verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice for the steps
Of a righteous man
They are ordered of God(x2)
Rejoice for the steps
Of a righteous man
They are ordered of God(x2)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
In the time of trouble
God will uphold you
God will preserve you
God will sustain you
In the time of trouble
God will lift you up
So rejoice your steps
Are ordered of God
